data.title: Population Statistics, Maps, Charts, Weather and Web Information
data.meta_description: Nigeria: States & Cities with population statistics, maps, charts, weather and web information.
data.text:
Contents: Cities & Urban Settlements

The population of Nigerian cities and urban settlements with more than 40,000 inhabitants according to the 1991 census.

More recent population figures are not available for urban areas. More up-to-date figures are provided by »City Population« for agglomerations and local government areas.
